"Wired Lances":
"Wired Lances are bladed weapons on the ends of wires which can be extended or retracted. They specialize in attacks that grab, throw and strike enemies.

When fully extended, their tricky attacks have the longest range of all melee weapons. They can also take small or medium-sized enemies out of the battle by grappling them and throwing them around.

<%WeaponActionText>: Guard, reducing damage taken from frontal attacks. Guard just before an attack hits you to prevent all damage from that attack."

"This explains the Wired Lance Gear system.

When you learn the skill \"Wired Lance Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of your Weapon Palette.

You can fill the Gear Gauge by hitting enemies with Wired Lance Normal Attacks."

"The Gear Gauge can hold up to three units of Gear. When you use a grappling Photon Art, that Photon Art's power will be boosted, at the cost of one unit of Gear.

The Gear Gauge does not empty over time."
